com.model.bodies

Class EntityBody

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.Body
      • com.model.bodies.EntityBody
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EnemyBody, HeroBody, PowerupBody, ProjectileBody

    public class EntityBody
extends com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.Body
    Default body type for all controllers.

      • EntityBody

        public EntityBody(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World world,
                  long addr,
                  EntityController model)
        Generates an entire Body for a Model.
        Parameters:
        world - World to add bodies to.
        addr - Address.
        model - Model associated with the body, the model stores the game logic.
